name: damp

effect.ruby-sapphire: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.emerald: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.firered-leafgreen: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.colosseum: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.xd: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
